Name: Dirty Sex on the Beach (with melon liqueur)
Ingredients: 15 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Rocks glass .
Prepare garnish of pineapple wedge & Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: Fruity and sweeter than most with green melon liqueur, black raspberry liqueur and pineapple juice laced with vodka.
Nutrition: One serving of Dirty Sex on the Beach (with melon liqueur) contains 217 calories
